languages.text: От решимости персонажей зависит, насколько эффективно и как долго они смогут сражаться. Решимость определяет количество {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}, получаемого в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} или за убийство противника.

Resolve influences how efficiently and for how long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.
languages.original_text: От решимости персонажей зависит, насколько эффективно и как долго они смогут сражаться. Решимость определяет количество {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}, получаемого в начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} или за убийство противника.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Resolve{/g} influences how efficiently and for long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.

Resolve influences how efficiently and for how long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.

Resolve influences how efficiently and for how long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.

languages.text: Die Entschlossenheit beeinflusst, wie effizient und wie lange die Charaktere in der Schlacht kämpfen können. Sie bestimmt, wie viel {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} oder nach dem Töten eines Feindes hinzugewonnen wird.
languages.original_text: Resolve influences how efficiently and for how long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.

traits.locale_text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} beeinflusst, wie effizient und wie lange die Charaktere in der Schlacht kämpfen können. Sie bestimmt, wie viel {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} oder nach dem Töten eines Gegners vorhanden ist.

languages.text: La Détermination influe sur l'efficacité et la durée du combat des personnages. Elle détermine le nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g} qu'ils obtiennent au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} ou après avoir éliminé un ennemi.
languages.original_text: Resolve influences how efficiently and for how long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} influe sur l'efficacité et la durée du combat des personnages. Elle détermine le nombre de points de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g} obtenus au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} ou après avoir éliminé un ennemi.

languages.text: 决心代表角色在战斗中的战斗效率与坚毅程度。决心决定该名角色每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，或击杀敌人时获得的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}多少。
languages.original_text: Resolve influences how efficiently and for how long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.

traits.locale_text: 决心代表角色在战斗中的战斗效率与坚毅程度。决心决定该名角色每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，或击杀敌人时获得的{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}多少。

languages.original_text: Resolve influences on how efficient and how long characters can act in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of the turn or after killing an enemy.

languages.text: La firmeza influye en la eficacia de los personajes en combate y en cuánto tiempo pueden luchar. Determina el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g} obtenido al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y al matar a un enemigo.
languages.original_text: Resolve influences how efficiently and for how long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.

traits.locale_text: La {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} influye en la eficacia de los personajes en combate y en cuánto tiempo pueden luchar. Determina el {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g} obtenido al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y al matar a un enemigo.

languages.text: 決断力はキャラクターが戦闘でどれだけ効率よく、どれだけ長く戦えるかに影響する。各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時や敵をキルした後に得られる{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}の量を決定する。
languages.original_text: Resolve influences how efficiently and for how long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.

traits.locale_text: 決断力はキャラクターが戦闘でどれだけ効率よく、どれだけ長く戦えるかに影響する。各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時や敵をキルした後に得られる{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}の量を決定する。

languages.text: Kararlılık, karakterin çatışmada ne denli etkili ve uzun süre savaşabileceğine etki eder. Her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başında veya bir düşmanı öldürdükten sonra kazanılacak {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} miktarını belirler.
languages.original_text: Resolve influences how efficiently and for how long characters can fight in the battle. It determines the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} gained at the beginning of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} or after killing an enemy.
